description: A delete statement with on a condition on the municipality column vulnerable to SQL Injection.

template: DELETE from airport WHERE latitude_deg={airports_latitude_deg} AND longitude_deg={airports_longitude_deg};
description: A delete statement using a condition on coordinates columns (latitude_deg, longitude_deg). A malicious payload can be injected in the latitude_deg field.

template: DELETE FROM airport WHERE keywords LIKE {airports_keywords};
description: A delete statement removing airports matching a keyword search, vulnerable to SQL injection.
